select PP_POMain.MainId,PP_POMain.ID,PP_POMain.fQuantity,PP_POMain.fInQuantity, Inventory.cInvCode,Inventory.cInvName,Inventory.cInvStd,Inventory.cInvAddCode,PP_ProductPO.cCode,PP_ProductPO.cMaker,PP_ProductPO.cDepCode, convert(varchar(50),PP_POMain.dStartDate,23) as dStartDate, convert(varchar(50),PP_POMain.dEndDate,23) as dEndDate, ComputationUnit.cComunitName,ComputationUnit.cComunitCode,PP_POMain.cDefine22 from PP_POMain left join Inventory on PP_POMain.cInvCode=Inventory.cInvCode left join ComputationUnit on Inventory.cComunitCode=ComputationUnit.cComunitCode left join PP_PODetails on PP_PODetails.MainID=PP_POMain.MainID left join PP_ProductPO on PP_ProductPO.ID=PP_POMain.ID
and PP_POMAin.ID=#{ID}
and PP_PODetails.fQuantity > PP_PODetails.fOutQuantity
and PP_POMAin.fQuantity > PP_POMain.fInQuantity

and MainId=#{mainId}
